channel.title: How Do i Make an NPC face in diffrent direction? Thanks
channel.description: Well title explains it really, just wondering how to turn an npc because in my new ::home its facing wrong way :|

item.title: How Do i Make an NPC face in diffrent direction? Thanks
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

Well, if you change the vertex coordinated of the npc that belongs in your npchandler class, you can adjust the vertex simulator to display a position therefore enabling you to simulate the non playing character to the way you want. You can also edit the base coordinates of the main system method, this will load the new position and simulate it the way you want as configured in your autospawn configuration.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i Make an NPC face in diffrent direction? Thanks
